content: To avoid repeating the mistakes of early adopters, if an innovation has already been field tested by other schools, a wise team devotes considerable time and attention to considering what others have learned. This learning requires considerable tact and skill because many early adopters may promote the innovation without sharing stories of frustration and disappointment.

content: The trick is to find innovators who can be trusted to share the trials and the tribulations as well as the triumphs. This search for verity often requires some probing past leadership levels to see what rank-and-file teachers report about the innovation experience.

content: The important words are "likely to produce learning gains." This is not about flash or excitement and fireworks. We are looking for solid results substantiated by concrete data. Testimonials are abundant but rarely reliable.

content: Just as folk wisdom argues that "Haste makes waste," research on change in schools warns against riding change mobiles through avalanche territory (Fullan, 1991).

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td div div p font span
content: Even though the shortest distance is usually a straight line, most road and railway

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td div div p font span
content: builders know better than to head straight up a mountain without providing plenty of curves.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td div div p font span
content: They rely on switchbacks to keep the angle of ascent reasonable.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td div div p font span
content: They know engines have their limits.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td div div p font span
content: Schools should follow this example. They should make the strategic pacing of change a priority if they hope to see a real (and beneficial) shift in classroom practice.

content: There are many advantages to delay when it comes to new technologies.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td div div p font span
content: School districts that come to the game late may find that slow and discerning decision making means they leapfrogged over some of the silly and misguided efforts of their neighbors.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td div div p font span
content: Sometimes it turns out that we end up ahead of the game by letting other fools rush in.
